title: Mumbai Metro Line 11: Underground?
description: Mumbai's Metro Line 11 plans to revolutionize commuting!  This 17.5 km underground line will stretch from Anik Depot to the iconic Gateway of India, significantly improving connectivity across the city.  The MMRCL's ambitious project aims to serve over 800,000 daily commuters, connecting major transit hubs.  Currently awaiting government approvals, this project promises a faster, more efficient travel experience for Mumbaikars.  Learn more about this game-changing infrastructure development and its potential impact on Mumbai's transportation network.  Stay tuned for updates on the project's progress and expected completion date.  This is a vital step towards easing traffic congestion and modernizing Mumbai's public transportation system.  Find out how this new metro line will shape the future of Mumbai's commute.
